Resurgent Repulsion.name: Resurgent Repulsion
Resurgent Repulsion.flavor: After suffering your opponents’ attacks, you strike back, frying one with a psychic assault that prevents it from concentrating.
Resurgent Repulsion.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn. If this attack is a critical hit, the target is also dazed (save ends).

Shards of Strength.name: Shards of Strength
Shards of Strength.flavor: Your psionic power overcomes all restraints, flooding out and manifesting shards of psionic force that surround your body.
Shards of Strength.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier force damage. The target takes ongoing 5 damage, and attacks against the target can score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 (save ends both).

Critical Insight.name: Critical Insight
Critical Insight.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when you or any ally hits the target with an attack, you can choose to end this effect and make that attack a critical hit.
